title: Knocked Down Lovingly - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Bisexual Protagonist   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Straight Uke
author: Wagon   화차
description:
On the day of my high school graduation, my first girlfriend confessed that she was in love with Choi Suho, my very own best friend. We broke up.

About a year before high school graduation, my older brother collapsed in a boxing match.

Not long before high school graduation, after the incident that hit my brother, my family became strongly against me continuing to pursue a boxing career.

Shortly after high school graduation, Suho, my best friend since childhood, did not return my ex-girlfriend's love. Instead, he confessed that he had fallen in love with me.

He wants me to be his brother, his family, his lover.>
